knowledge_graph.title: Despicable Me 4
knowledge_graph.description: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., who's intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.
knowledge_graph.music_by: Heitor Pereira (score); Pharrell Williams (songs and themes)

audience_reviews.summary: So much better than the trailer. This is my new favorite in the franchise and one of my new favorite movies overall. If you don't walk away full of joy and tearing up in laughter then ...

related_questions.question: Is Despicable Me 4 out?
related_questions.snippet: Family movies are powering the box office. “Despicable Me 4” performed strongly despite the still considerable drawing power of “Inside Out 2.” In its fourth weekend of release, the Pixar sequel added another $30 million domestically and $78.3 million overseas.
related_questions.title: 'Despicable Me 4' debuts with $122.6M as boom times return to ...

related_questions.question: Where can you watch Despicable Me 4?
related_questions.snippet: Theatrical Release: The film premiered in theaters on July 3, 2024. Peacock Debut: Following its theatrical run, Despicable Me 4 will make its streaming debut on Peacock on October 31, 2024.
related_questions.title: Despicable Me 4 Release Date: Here's when you can stream the ...

related_questions.question: Is Despicable Me 4 a good movie?
related_questions.snippet: The Despicable Me franchise's best-reviewed film remains the first one, with a “fresh” 80% approval rating on the aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes. Somewhat disappointingly, 8th-JULY: Despicable Me 4is currently the worst-rated film of the franchise, with an RT score of 54%.

related_questions.question: Will vector return in Despicable Me 4?
related_questions.snippet: Despicable Me 4 features iconic villains in a prison concert, including Vector, Mr. Perkins, El Macho, Balthazar Bratt, Scarlet & Herb Overkill, and The Vicious 6. Despicable Me 4 is full of Easter eggs and callbacks to previous films.
